Our mission is to

Empower students through developing their tech skills

Get involved Become a student

We develop students’ creative & problem-solving skills

Classes use of innovative multi-cultural learning materials & technologies like Virtual & Augmented Reality.

We connect students with real-life professionals

Students learn from, and work with skills-based corporate volunteers, who create an easy-to-learn visual curriculum.

We create tech-based stem opportunities

Our program builds pathways for students to enter into employment, entrepreneurship & college.

“Our aim is to create a million makers…

who are incredibly engaged and excited about science, technology, arts & math.
Joseph Spence, Co-convener
We are a public-private partnership designed to enhance tech related job, entrepreneurial and educational opportunities for refugees and other underrepresented communities in Utah.

Partners

  • Presented by
  • Implementation partners
  • Government
  • Donating
  • Fiscal sponsors

We leverage skill-based volunteerism as well as targeted in-kind and financial donations to provide free training and tech certification pathways for qualified applicants who otherwise would not have access to these opportunities.

We target individuals with demonstrated financial need, interest in tech fields, a strong desire for self-improvement and a history of community engagement.

Our methodology centers around using infographic materials to distill information; facilitated group dialogue; and hands-on projects that nurture the inherent curiosity, self-confidence, communication and teamwork skills of participants.

Let’s make an impact

Our courses empower students to pursue tech careers. Mindfulness and brain building, game design, web development, or IT, we offer something for every creative mind.
Check out our courses

Making  it happen
Our program will always be available to students at no cost. Each course is taught and supported by computer science professionals.
